text: Me nguibar kamningɨn mɨdorozir gumazir kaba, mozibagh arɨgha gumazir onganarazibagh amibar mɨn pura me afi. Me fomɨra mɨdorozir gumaziba mozibagh arɨzir arazibar gɨn ghua me afir puvatɨ. Me men arazir kurar me fomɨram amizibar gɨn ghua, men mɨdorozir sababa men dapanibar aghonegha, men oraba men agharibagh isɨn arɨki, ezɨ me Gumazamizir Oveaghuezibar Nguibamɨn ghuaghiri. Mesek ko Tubal angamɨra itir dughiamɨn, aning gumazamizir bar avɨrim atiatim me ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, aningɨn arazir kurabar osɨmtɨzim aningɨn ikiavɨra itima aning areme.
